title: Article 1 - Rules of Racing
content:
Article 1 - Rules of Racing

State Regulations

Part 4000 - General Provisions (§ 4000.1 to 4000.4)

Part 4001 - Powers And Duties Of The Commission

Part 4002 - Occupational Licenses (§ 4002.1 to 4002.32)

Part 4003 - Racing Associations

Part 4004 - Transmission Of Information (§ 4004.1 to 4004.7)

Part 4005 - Association Employees (§ 4005.1 to 4005.5)

Part 4006 - Racing Employees (§ 4006.1 to 4006.8)

Part 4007 - Horses (§ 4007.1 to 4007.8)

Part 4008 - Racing Results (§ 4008.1 to 4008.5)

Part 4009 - PARI-MUTUEL OPERATION (§ 4009.1 to 4009.27)

Part 4010 - Pool Calculations (§ 4010.1 to 4010.6)

Part 4011 - The Daily Double

Part 4012 - Possession Of Drugs And Drug Testing (§ 4012.1 to 4012.6)

Part 4013 - Repealed

Part 4014 - Breeders' Awards (§ 4014.1)

Part 4020 - GENERAL PROVISIONS FOR RACE MEETINGS (§ 4020.1 to 4020.4)

Part 4021 - Regulations For Race Meeting (§ 4021.1 to 4021.6)

Part 4022 - The Stewards (§ 4022.1 to 4022.23)

Part 4023 - Officials Of The Meeting (§ 4023.1 to 4023.9)

Part 4024 - Registration Of Horses (§ 4024.1 to 4024.2)

Part 4025 - Entries, Subscriptions, Declarations And Acceptances For Races (§ 4025.1 to 4025.33)

Part 4026 - Ownership Rules And Stable Names

Part 4027 - Stakes, Subscriptions (§ 4027.1 to 4027.4)

Part 4028 - Qualifications Of Starters (§ 4028.1 to 4028.9)

Part 4029 - Scale Of Weights (§ 4029.1 to 4029.9)

Part 4030 - Calculating Winnings (§ 4030.1 to 4030.7)

Part 4031 - Penalties And Allowances (§ 4031.1 to 4031.4)

Part 4032 - Apprentice Jockeys And Weight Allowances (§ 4032.1 to 4032.4)

Part 4033 - Weighing Out (§ 4033.1 to 4033.8)

Part 4034 - Starting (§ 4034.1 to 4034.15)

Part 4035 - Rules Of The Race (§ 4035.1 to 4035.9)

Part 4036 - Weighing In (§ 4036.1 to 4036.4)

Part 4037 - Dead Heats (§ 4037.1 to 4037.5)

Part 4038 - Claiming Races (§ 4038.1 to 4038.19)

Part 4039 - Disputes, Objections, Appeals

Part 4040 - Restrictions On Jockeys And Stable Employees

Part 4041 - Racing Colors And Numbers (§ 4041.1 to 4041.6)

Part 4042 - Corrupt Practices And Disqualifications Of Persons (§ 4042.1 to 4042.6)

Part 4043 - Drugs Prohibited and Other Prohibitions (§ 4043.1 to 4043.17)

Part 4044 - Voluntary Exclusion From Racetracks And Restrictions On Telephone Account Wagering

Part 4045 - Minimum Penalty Enhancement (§ 4045.1 to 4045.6)

Part 4046 - Jockey Injury Compensation Fund (§ 4046.1 to 4046.7)

Part 4047 - Backstretch Worker Housing (Repealed)

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
